review: I received the Fire Stick as a birthday present from my son. He set everything up which didn't take long at all. I love it ! I use it everyday ! You can also download apps and games. If you have a subscription to Netflix, Amazon Prime or Hulu Plus you can enjoy them as well.  Wonderful device.
